question: Will 246 million Americans have received at least one dose of an approved Covid-19 vaccination by January 1, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether 246.0 million people in The United States of America will have initiated vaccination, according to the CDC COVID tracker, by the resolution date, January 1, 2022, 8:00 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 246.0 million people or more are listed as having received their initial dose of vaccination by the resolution source. This only concerns the first dose of vaccination. For vaccines requiring two doses for inoculation, this market considers only the first dose as having initiated vaccination. 
This market will resolve to "No" if, for any reason, fewer than 246.0 million people have initiated vaccination by the resolution date. 

The resolution source for this market will be the official data published by the CDC available at https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#vaccinations, and will be checked at the resolution time. 

If the website is down, the most recently available data will be used to resolve the market. If the website is not down, this market will resolve according to the data as available immediately at the time of resolution, and resolution will not be delayed for the purpose of waiting for updated data from a specific date.

question: Will Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) flip CryptoPunks by January 10, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether the floor price of BAYC (Bored Ape Yacht Club) will surpass the floor price of CryptoPunks on or before January 10 2022, 12 PM ET.

The resolution source for BAYC will be prices listed on OpenSea (https://opensea.io/collection/boredapeyachtclub), specifically the price of the cheapest Bored Ape for sale. Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market. List time for an NFT can be found under “Trading History” by clicking the “Listing” filter and hovering over the date. Note that the exact price at the check times will be used. If no floor price is available at the check times, the source will be checked every following hour. For valid listings that are declining price auctions, the price exactly at the check time will be used, NOT the price at initial listing time. 

The resolution source for CryptoPunks will be (https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks/forsale#), specifically the price of the cheapest CryptoPunk for sale. Only listings that have existed for at least an hour prior to each check time are valid for this market (as verified by the transaction hash time). 

Both sources will be checked at 12 AM ET and 12 PM ET each day, starting with the first check time at 12 AM ET, December 9, 2021, until the last check on January 10 2022, 12 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at any check time the floor price of BAYC is higher than CryptoPunks. If by the final check the floor price of BAYC was never above the Cryptopunk floor price on any of the checks, it will resolve to "No".

If the links to the sources change, the new changed link sources will be used.

question: UEFA Champions League: Which group E team will qualify to the knockout phase?
description:
This is the market on the Champions League 2021/22 Group E standings.

Two teams out of four from each group advance to the round of 16.

In group E, Bayern Munich has already guaranteed the advancement and Dynamo Kyiv will be eliminated, however, the runner-up is still not resolved.

The deciding games, Bayern v Barcelona and Benfica v Dynamo are scheduled to take place on December 8, 3 PM ET.

This market will resolve to either Barcelona or Benfica, whichever will win the 2nd spot in group E.

If the qualifying team isn't determined by December 15, 2021, the market will resolve equally among the brackets.

Read more about standings and fixtures of UEFA Champions League: https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/

question: NBA: Will the Cavaliers beat the Bulls by more than 2.5 points in their December 8 matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for December 8:

If the Cleveland Cavaliers win by over 2.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Chicago Bulls lose by less than 2.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by December 15, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: NBA: Will the sum of points in Clippers v Celtics be an even or an odd number?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game between Los Angeles Clippers and Boston Celtics, scheduled for December 8:

If the total sum of points scored is an even number (ie. score is 120-118, 97-133, 115-113...), this market will resolve to “Even”.

If the total sum of points scored is an odd number (ie. score is 120-119, 97-132, 114-115...), this market will resolve to “Odd”.

If the game is not completed by December 15, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.
